name: I Just Wanna Run
content: I just wanna run hide it away
我只想逃离 找个藏身之所
I just wanna run throw it away
我只想逃避 抛开一切念头
Run before they're finding me out
在他们找出我之前逃开
I try to call your house
Can't reach you on the phone
Don't treat me like a drag
